originalText.text: Amazing doctor and staff. Had a recent surgery on my wrist, and on the recovery journey now. Thank you Dr. Osei for making my experience, as pleasant, as it can be (we are talking surgery after all), you are truly the best. And big thank you for all the professionals and team members at HHS, everyone is extremely nice and helpful.

originalText.text: I can’t overstate how grateful I am to have as my wrist surgery performed by Daniel. I consulted with a few other specialist before meeting with him and they both recommended a surgery that would give me limited mobility in my wrist. He was OK just removing some old hardware and seeing if that would help. Two years later 99% of my pain is gone I have almost full mobility and more strength than I ever expected. I have a carpenter who works with my hands every day the value in this cannot be overstated and I am truly overjoyed with the results. Thank you thank you thank you.

originalText.text: I had gone for 2 surgical consultations in NY! I was very skeptical about surgery. Dr. Osei made me feel so comfortable and explained in detail about my surgery. Dr. Osei exceeded my expectations!! He is amazing with great bedside manner. His office staff is truly a reflection on him and they have been wonderful since the beginning.

text.text: I had gone for 2 surgical consultations in NY! I was very skeptical about surgery. Dr. Osei made me feel so comfortable and explained in detail about my surgery. Dr. Osei exceeded my expectations!! He is amazing with great bedside manner. His office staff is truly a reflection on him and they have been wonderful since the beginning.

originalText.text: Dr. Osei is an amazing surgeon. I was very pleased with his bedside manner.  He expediting my surgery and showed genuine empathy for my circumstances.  If you need hand surgery, he is a wise choice and I’d happily recommend him.

text.text: Dr. Osei is an amazing surgeon. I was very pleased with his bedside manner.  He expediting my surgery and showed genuine empathy for my circumstances.  If you need hand surgery, he is a wise choice and I’d happily recommend him.

originalText.text:
Brief Review: Great bedside manner, did not experience any pain/swelling after surgery, spoke with me right before surgery and explained everything in detail, made sure all my questions were answered, he's really into the procedure and makes it a point to let you know that following discharge instructions is important and even goes out of the way to make sure you have minimal scarring.

Detailed Review:  I had a huge Ganglion Cyst on my right wrist that was aspirated and grew back 3x larger causing numbness whenever I flexed my hand. I chose Dr. Osei because he worked for HSS and had a lot of experience.. Both Dr. Osei and his staff made this the most easiest, quick and pain free surgical experience. The first day I met him, he evaluated me, ordered an MRI, blood work and x-rays all on the same day and scheduled my surgery for the following week. Not only was I nervous because I never had surgery, but I was also pressed for time because I started back school in less than a month... Fast Forward, his  entire surgical team went over everything in detail (A LOT). I chose the option to be put to sleep, once I woke up, I did not experience any pain, they feed you, make sure you use the bathroom, keep you in the recovery area for about 2 hrs, then sends you home with a free pillow. Everyone from the assistants to the Nurses were extremely nice and caring. He prescribed me pain pills but I was shocked I didn't need to take them, Also the surgical site looked like a small cut, you wouldn't even notice it was cut open!!  My arm was in a splint for about a week and it looks like I'll be able to start back school with no issues. Very excited with my results, this whole process took about two weeks!!!  I will post a before (cyst shown), during healing, and after healing photos once I'm completely healed for you to see for yourself!
